articles.title: 5 penalties out of 6 attempts: Milan is the team that scores the most in the current championship
articles.summary: Milan, together with Pisa and Fiorentina, are one of the three teams that have scored the most goals from penalties in Serie A (five) out of six attempts; the only mistake was made by Pulisic against Juventus in Turin and Opta reports it.

articles.title: Allegri is hot on Capello's heels: the current AC Milan have 22 useful results in a row. In 1992-1993 there were 23
articles.summary: Milan (W14, D8) remained unbeaten for at least 22 games in a row in a single Serie A championship for the first time since 1992/93 (streak of 23 matches with Fabio Capello as coach). Opta reports it.
